description: Try our easy to follow Miso Roast Pumpkin and Polenta Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Miso Roast Pumpkin and Polenta Slice
name: Miso Roast Pumpkin and Polenta Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour mixture into slice pan and smooth surface. Scatter with sesame seeds. Press pumpkin into surface. Chill for 30 minutes or until firm. Cut into pieces and top with chives and chilli to serve.
